description.en: Your movement is silent, and you can spend a Hope to move up to Far range without rolling.
description.ru: Your movement is silent, and you can spend a Hope to move up to Far range without rolling.

description.en: When you take Major or greater damage, you drop out of Beastform.
description.ru: When you take Major or greater damage, you drop out of Beastform.

description.en: When you Help an Ally, you can roll a d8 as your advantage die.
description.ru: When you Help an Ally, you can roll a d8 as your advantage die.

description.en: When you take Major or greater damage, you drop out of Beastform.
description.ru: When you take Major or greater damage, you drop out of Beastform.

description.en: When an attack roll against you would succeed, you can mark a Stress and roll a d4. Add the result to your Evasion against this attack.
description.ru: When an attack roll against you would succeed, you can mark a Stress and roll a d4. Add the result to your Evasion against this attack.

description.en: When you take Major or greater damage, you drop out of Beastform.
description.ru: When you take Major or greater damage, you drop out of Beastform.

description.en: When you succeed on an attack against a target within Melee range, you can mark a Stress to make the target temporarily Vulnerable.
description.ru: When you succeed on an attack against a target within Melee range, you can mark a Stress to make the target temporarily Vulnerable.

description.en: When you succeed on an attack against the same target as an ally who acts immediately before you, add a d8 to your damage roll.
description.ru: When you succeed on an attack against the same target as an ally who acts immediately before you, add a d8 to your damage roll.

description.en: You can breathe and move naturally underwater.
description.ru: You can breathe and move naturally underwater.

description.en: When you take Major or greater damage, you drop out of Beastform.
description.ru: When you take Major or greater damage, you drop out of Beastform.

description.en: When you succeed on an attack against a target within Melee range, the target becomes temporarily Poisoned. A Poisoned creature takes 1d10 direct physical damage each time they act.
description.ru: When you succeed on an attack against a target within Melee range, the target becomes temporarily Poisoned. A Poisoned creature takes 1d10 direct physical damage each time they act.

description.en: You can create a strong web material useful for both adventuring and battle. The web is resilient enough to support one creature. You can temporarily Restrain a target within Close range by succeeding on a Finesse Roll against them.
description.ru: You can create a strong web material useful for both adventuring and battle. The web is resilient enough to support one creature. You can temporarily Restrain a target within Close range by succeeding on a Finesse Roll against them.

description.en: Your hardened exterior gives you resistance to physical damage. Additionally, mark an Armor Slot to retract into your shell. While in your shell, physical damage is reduced by a number equal to your Armor Score (after applying resistance), but you can’t perform other actions without leaving this form.
description.ru: Your hardened exterior gives you resistance to physical damage. Additionally, mark an Armor Slot to retract into your shell. While in your shell, physical damage is reduced by a number equal to your Armor Score (after applying resistance), but you can’t perform other actions without leaving this form.

description.en: Mark a Stress to allow an ally to throw or launch you at an adversary. To do so, the ally makes an attack roll using Agility or Strength (their choice) against a target within Close range. On a success, the adversary takes d12+2 physical damage using the thrower’s Proficiency. You can spend a Hope to target an additional adversary within Very Close range of the first. The second target takes half the damage dealt to the first target.
description.ru: Mark a Stress to allow an ally to throw or launch you at an adversary. To do so, the ally makes an attack roll using Agility or Strength (their choice) against a target within Close range. On a success, the adversary takes d12+2 physical damage using the thrower’s Proficiency. You can spend a Hope to target an additional adversary within Very Close range of the first. The second target takes half the damage dealt to the first target.

description.en: When you roll a 1 on a damage die, you can roll a d10 and add the result to the damage roll. Additionally, before you make an attack roll, you can mark a Stress to gain a +1 bonus to your Proficiency for that attack.
description.ru: When you roll a 1 on a damage die, you can roll a d10 and add the result to the damage roll. Additionally, before you make an attack roll, you can mark a Stress to gain a +1 bonus to your Proficiency for that attack.

description.en: You can carry up to two willing allies with you when you move.
description.ru: You can carry up to two willing allies with you when you move.

description.en: Mark a Stress to move up to Close range in a straight line and make an attack against all targets within Melee range of the line. Targets you succeed against take d8+1 physical damage using your Proficiency and are temporarily Vulnerable.
description.ru: Mark a Stress to move up to Close range in a straight line and make an attack against all targets within Melee range of the line. Targets you succeed against take d8+1 physical damage using your Proficiency and are temporarily Vulnerable.

description.en: Make an attack against any number of targets within Very Close range. On a success, a target is temporarily Poisoned. A Poisoned creature takes 1d10 direct physical damage each time they act.
description.ru: Make an attack against any number of targets within Very Close range. On a success, a target is temporarily Poisoned. A Poisoned creature takes 1d10 direct physical damage each time they act.

description.en: Mark a Stress to force any number of targets within Melee range to move back to Very Close range.
description.ru: Mark a Stress to force any number of targets within Melee range to move back to Very Close range.

description.en: Spend a Hope to move up to Far range without rolling.
description.ru: Spend a Hope to move up to Far range without rolling.

description.en: Mark a Stress to move into Melee range of a target and make an attack roll against them. On a success, you gain a +2 bonus to your Proficiency for this attack and the target must mark a Stress.
description.ru: Mark a Stress to move into Melee range of a target and make an attack roll against them. On a success, you gain a +2 bonus to your Proficiency for this attack and the target must mark a Stress.

description.en: You can fly at will. Once per rest while you are airborne, you can ask the GM a question about the scene below you without needing to roll. The first time a character makes a roll to act on this information, they gain advantage on the roll.
description.ru: You can fly at will. Once per rest while you are airborne, you can ask the GM a question about the scene below you without needing to roll. The first time a character makes a roll to act on this information, they gain advantage on the roll.
